org.kohsuke.args4j

Class MBFImageOptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kohsuke.args4j.spi.OptionHandler<MBFImage>
      • org.kohsuke.args4j.MBFImageOptionHandler

  • public class MBFImageOptionHandler
extends org.kohsuke.args4j.spi.OptionHandler<MBFImage>
    An OptionHandler that can provide a MBFImage from a file name.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
